entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
